alert.note: Alert for Edgecombe; Halifax (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 03 at 5:17PM EDT by NWS Raleigh
info.description: ...Multiple strong thunderstorms will impact portions of north central Edgecombe and central Halifax Counties through 600 PM EDT... At 515 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles south of Halifax, moving east at 20 mph. Another strong thunderstorm is located 5 miles northwest of Scotland Neck, also moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Halifax, Scotland Neck, Enfield and Tillery. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will relay your report to the National Weather Service office in Raleigh.
